definitions.definition: Of, related to, or typifying extortion ( “ the practice of obtaining money or other property by the use of force or threats ” ) .
Greatly exceeding what is moderate or reasonable ; exorbitant .

main_definition: Of, related to, or typifying extortion ( “ the practice of obtaining money or other property by the use of force or threats ” ) .
secondary_definitions: Greatly exceeding what is moderate or reasonable ; exorbitant .
